title: Model Workforce Cost for New Location
description: The company is considering opening a new office, and leadership needs HR to model the projected workforce costs.

tasks.description: Gather the projected headcount and roles for the new location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst receives the list of 50 proposed roles.

tasks.description: Research market salary data for the specified roles in the new geographic location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst pulls salary benchmark data from a compensation survey tool.

tasks.description: Create a cost model that includes salaries, estimated bonus payouts, payroll taxes, and benefits costs to project the total workforce expense.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst builds a spreadsheet model and provides a total projected cost to leadership.
